post:
SolarVM is back with great offers to suit your needs! With blazing fast VPS servers and awesome support!

______________________________________________
OVZ MINI

Mini ($5 / month)

**CPU Cores: 1 vCore
RAM Capacity: 256MB RAM
Disk Space: 10GB
Bandwidth: 250GB @ 1Gbps
Server Country: The Netherlands
IP Addresses: 1 IPv4**
______________________________________________

Our servers are located in NL with great connectivity to US and EU! All our VPS come with 24x7 support and 1 Gigabit connections. To manage your VPS we have created our own control panel making it easy to manage billing and servers from one place!

Screenshots: 

http://puu.sh/1HisY
http://puu.sh/1HitW
http://puu.sh/1Hiuv
http://puu.sh/1HiuV

Test files & Speedtests

Looking glass: http://lg.bluinet.info/

You can find all speedtests in the LG.


If you have any questions do not hesitate to contact us at info@bluinet.info
